publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-916 Mrs Mary Mulligan: Whitburn Junior Football Club—That the Parliament congratulates Whitburn Junior Football Club on its excellent victory in the OVD Scottish Junior Cup Final for the first time in its history and wishes continuing success to the club and to junior football generally in Scotland. Supported by: Fiona Hyslop*
S1M-916 Whitburn Junior Football Club (lodged on 30 May 2000) Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-916 Whitburn Junior Football Club (lodged on 30 May 2000) Allan Wilson*

S1M-916 Mrs Mary Mulligan: Whitburn Junior Football Club-That the Parliament congratulates Whitburn Junior Football Club on its excellent victory in the OVD Scottish Junior Cup Final for the first time in its history and wishes continuing success to the club and to junior football generally in Scotland. Supported by: Fiona Hyslop, Tommy Sheridan, Allan Wilson, Bristow Muldoon*
S1M-916 Whitburn Junior Football Club (lodged on 30 May 2000) Mr Michael McMahon*
S1M-916 Whitburn Junior Football Club (lodged on 30 May 2000) Mr Brian Monteith*, Mr John McAllion*

S1M-916 Mrs Mary Mulligan: Whitburn Junior Football Club-That the Parliament congratulates Whitburn Junior Football Club on its excellent victory in the OVD Scottish Junior Cup Final for the first time in its history and wishes continuing success to the club and to junior football generally in Scotland. Supported by: Fiona Hyslop, Tommy Sheridan, Allan Wilson, Bristow Muldoon, Mr Michael McMahon, Mr Brian Monteith, Mr John McAllion
